DdMd::NphIntegrator Class Reference
MD Integrators

Detailed Description

A reversible, symplectic NPH integrator (Anderson barostat).

Integration algorithm based on Martyna,Tobias and Klein (J. Chem. Phys. 101, 4177-4189, 1994).

Definition at line 27 of file ddMd/integrators/NphIntegrator.h.

#include <NphIntegrator.h>

void DdMd::NphIntegrator::readParam ( std::istream &  in) [virtual]

Read required parameters.

For velocity-verlet algorithm, reads the time step dt.

Reimplemented from Util::ParamComposite.
